metadata.description: What do you do when your parents sign you up as a member of the most unlucky 'Shrub Scout' troop on the planet? Well, if you're Mike Manly you do everything you can to get out! As Mike quickly discovers the only way out of the 'Weasel Troop' is to earn all of the merit badges needed to graduate. Wish Mike good luck, 'cause he's gonna need it!
metadata.name: Scouts Drafted
